accessibility_analysis.summary: Good accessibility foundation but needs improvements in color contrast and keyboard navigation. Several WCAG AA violations detected.
design_flaws: Primary CTA button has insufficient color contrast (3.2:1, needs 4.5:1)
Form labels are not properly associated with input fields
Navigation menu lacks keyboard focus indicators
Text size below 16px on mobile devices
positive_aspects: Semantic HTML structure is well-implemented
Heading hierarchy follows proper H1-H6 order
Skip navigation link is present
Form validation provides clear error messages
recommendations: Increase button contrast to meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 minimum)
Add proper aria-labels and form associations
Implement visible focus indicators for keyboard navigation
Add descriptive alt text for all images
Increase base font size to 16px minimum on mobile

conversion_analysis.summary: Decent conversion potential but lacks trust signals and has friction points in the purchase funnel. CTA placement needs optimization.
design_flaws: Primary CTA button is below the fold on mobile
No visible trust badges or security certificates
No customer reviews visible on product pages
positive_aspects: Clear value proposition in hero section
Product pricing is prominently displayed
Free shipping offer is highlighted
Clean product grid layout
Mobile-responsive design
recommendations: Move primary CTA above the fold on all devices
Add trust badges (SSL, payment security, guarantees)
Implement product image zoom and multiple angles
Offer guest checkout option to reduce friction
Display customer reviews and ratings prominently
Add urgency elements (limited time offers, stock levels)
Implement exit-intent popups with discount offers

mobile_first_analysis.summary: Strong mobile-first design with good touch targets and responsive layout. Minor improvements needed for thumb-friendly navigation.
design_flaws: Navigation menu items are 40px (should be 44px minimum)
Search icon is positioned outside thumb-friendly zone
Form inputs could be larger for easier tapping
Horizontal scrolling required for some content sections
positive_aspects: Excellent responsive breakpoints and fluid layout
Touch targets are mostly appropriately sized
Content is easily scannable on small screens
Fast loading with optimized images
Swipe gestures work smoothly
Vertical navigation is thumb-friendly
recommendations: Increase all touch targets to minimum 44x44px
Reposition search to bottom navigation for thumb access
Enlarge form inputs and add more padding
Eliminate horizontal scrolling on all screen sizes
Add pull-to-refresh functionality
Implement bottom sheet navigation for better reachability

brand_consistency_analysis.summary: Excellent brand consistency with cohesive color palette and typography. Strong visual identity maintained throughout the interface.
design_flaws: Icon styles vary between sections (outline vs filled)
Some images don't follow brand color treatment
positive_aspects: Primary brand colors used consistently throughout
Typography hierarchy is well-established and maintained
Logo placement and sizing is consistent
Brand voice reflected in UI copy and messaging
Consistent spacing and layout grid system
Cohesive illustration and photography style
recommendations: Standardize secondary button styles across all pages
Create icon style guide and apply consistently
Apply brand color filters to photography
Develop component library for design consistency
Document brand guidelines for future development
